ProductCollection.name: Logitech Mouse
ProductCollection.description: LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse with HERO Sensor

ProductCollection.name: Logitech Keyboard
ProductCollection.description: A physical keyboard that uses an individual spring and switch for each key. Today, only premium keyboards are built with key switches; however, they were also used in the past, such as in the Model M keyboard from IBM, which used buckling spring switches

ProductCollection.name: HP Optical Mouse
ProductCollection.description: Utilizing the latest optical sensing technology, the HP USB Optical Scroll Mouse records precise motion.

ProductCollection.name: MacBook Pro
ProductCollection.description: It features a touch-sensitive OLED display strip located in place of the function keys, a Touch ID sensor integrated with the power button, a butterfly mechanism keyboard similar to the MacBook, and four USB-C ports that also serve as Thunderbolt 3 ports.

ProductCollection.name: Magic Mouse
ProductCollection.description: The Magic Mouse 2 (Apple Magic Mouse 2), is a computer mouse developed and released by Apple Inc. It features a multi-touch acrylic surface for scrolling. ... The mouse features a lithium-ion rechargeable battery and Lightning connector for charging and pairing.

ProductCollection.name: Brother Printer
ProductCollection.description: Our affordable, quality machines provide you with the optimal way to take care of all your printing needs. Shop for the right printer, all-in-one, or fax machine for your home or home office today.

ProductCollection.name: iPhone 11
ProductCollection.description: The iPhone 11 dimensions are 150.9mm x 75.7mm x 8.3mm (H x W x D). It weighs about 194 grams (6.84 ounces).It features a 6.1-inch all-screen LCD display and is powered by Apple new A13 bionic chip with Third-Generation Neural Engine.

ProductCollection.name: Google Pixel 3a
ProductCollection.description: At 5.6 inches, the Google Pixel 3a display is proportionate to the relatively small body of the phone – that is to say, it is rather small. The display is Full HD+ and OLED, with a resolution of 2220 x 1080, and because of the relatively small screen size the pixels per inch count is rather high at 441.

ProductCollection.name: PlayStation 4
ProductCollection.description: PS4 is the fourth home video game console produced by Sony Computer Entertainment and is compatible with the PlayStation 3. It was officially announced at a press conference on February 20, 2013 and launched on November 15, 2013.

ProductCollection.name: Dell Monitor
ProductCollection.description: 34'' U3419W Monitor, Display with stand Height adjustable (115 mm), tiltable (-5° to 21°), rotatable (-30° to 30°) Security slot (cable lock sold separately), anti-theft slot for locking to stand (for display). Includes: DisplayPort cable, HDMI cable, Power cable, Stand, USB 3.0 Type-A to Type-B cable, USB-C cable
